content.detailedDescription: For a few weeks i had started sleeping with my window cracked open at night because it had been getting pretty warm in my bedroom. one night i was awoke by what i can only describe as some sort of howling sound. but it wasn't any animal i've heard before and i don't live near the woods. it sounded as though it was right outside my window, i was too scared to look. i stayed awake for awhile and then fell back to sleep. the same sound happened again the next night at the exact same time, i can't recall the time now but i believe it was about 3:30 am. this time i had to see what it was, maybe some kids playing pranks. i peeked through my current and there in the sky were three orangeish red lights flashing in some pattern. i watched it for a moment and then with the blink of an eye it was just gone. i thought for sure i must have just been seeing things as it was so early in the morning and i was tired. but that sound, the sound still gives me chills just thinking about it.
content.summary: Howling sound and lights

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching these lights in the same position for over 4 days  and someone needs to look into this,
to high into the sky to be any sort of tower ,not a plane ,way to low to be a satellite ,but it has been there for over 4 days
content.summary: It's still there ,4 days now

content.detailedDescription:
1.) sitting outside on the balcony. 
2.) saw something out of the corner of my eye.
3.) a plane.
4.) i looked up and saw a bright red/orange light in the sky. it streaked across the sky faster than anything i have ever seen. i have been on many planes, and have seen jets.  their speed isn't even comparable.  it flew across the sky with a slight curve, dropping towards the horizon, and then it took off almost straight up and the light diminished in the blink of an eye.  
5.) i was immediately freaked out.  my eyes began to water, and i just sat there in shock of what i had just seen.  a few weeks prior i was driving home from work, and i saw something very similar streak across the sky and disappear behind some trees.  i sped up to try and see, but i figured for how fast it was moving there was no way i was gonna see it again.  after i drove a little further i thought i had to be crazy.  it was probably just someone messing with fireworks.  as soon as i saw the ufo tonight, i knew i had to have seen the same thing.  i have always been a debunker as my friends have claimed to see ufo's, and have always come up with facts to prove them wrong. there are no explanations to what i saw tonight.
6.) it took off towards space.  i thought it was already going fast across the sky, but then took off and disappeared immediately.
content.summary: Light caught my eye. looked up and saw a red/orange light streak across the sky and then launch into the sky and disappear immediately.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike in the city of meridian when i saw a bight lite coming my way - was it flew over i could see it was circle shape with two red lights on the bottom - it made no sound - then disappeared into thin air
content.summary: Object was round with red haze and two bright red lights - flew over going due south - then flew on for a few miles then blinked and disappeared into thin air on a clear nite - no sound - flew right thru boise airport air space

content.detailedDescription:
1 at the end of nine mile east of jefferson in saintclare shores michigan fishing
2strange light in water or above the water never saw the object
3 we had no idea
4 the was 200 yards or so away when we saw it and moving in our direction 
5 we have no memory of what happened after the light got close to us at some point we lost 2:30 hours and we wer a long way from or poles and bikes cold and confused and had strange thought that it was a helicopter cold scared we went home and never talk about it agin until 2012 and my friend asked if i remembered the light and said what was the deal with that did you see a helicopter i said i did remember but not seeing the helicopter just had the memory that was what was he said me too how did we get down away from our stuf i said i didn't know he said the same why we never talked about it we don't know that or what happened either and i  would like to know i don't know if he dose or not
6 never saw anything but the light until 2:30 latter and no light
content.summary: We snuck to lake to fish we were camping in my back yard went we got to the end of nine mile to end  and the shore and set to fish got the lines in and saw light in the lake and we didn't know if it was in water or above it  2:30 latter were not were we w

content.detailedDescription: I was night fishing on miami beach,approx 49th st and the ocean. no fish were biting as i stared into the night sky. i was happy to witness a "shooting star" or a burning piece of rock entering the atmosphere. about 3:30am i noticed a reallybright light. what caught my undivided attention was when i noticed the light grow even brighter. not too far south was a cruise ship and its normally bright lights in the dark of night seemed dim in comparison to this surging glow of super bright, bluish white light. then the brightness settled into a smaller light, circular as a beam of light. the object just hovered until it slowly climbed diagonally upward. at this time a kind of fear swept over me, realizing that this was in fact a ufo, and alien life force. the ship, or bright light, lowered back to its original height above the ocean, then drifted slowly to the left (north). for a moment i thought i lost it, then i noticed a dim green light, in a horizontal, block pattern of green/black/green/black. the light appeared to be moving horizontal while the ship slowly drifted left (north), which also gave it the appearance of slowly spinning. this green/black spinning ship continued slowly drifting to the north, also seemingly outward into deeper space until it was out of sight. the event lasted about 15min. ending about 3:45 a.M. i was left in pure shock with an eerie chill being there alone, wishing someone would've shared that experience with me. as i viewed the buildings along collins ave., i saw several lights on and wondered how many others witnessed this event from their apartment. there were other airplanes around, hovering as usual waiting for entrance into miami international airport, and one cruise ship in the distance, yet this glowing, super bright, position changing, color changing object was obviously different. rising then lowering twice, once each while bluish white and when green/black moving pattern, this was no doubt an alien airship seeking out its hidden places in the ocean. after it left, i continued as planned fishing until sunrise. no fish were biting at all, and i wondered if the event had anything to do with that. i have not been able to think of anything other than those 15 minutes of time, witnessing such an event. i am both excited and eager to know how many others reported the same thing, and to gain the attention of nasa and other related agencies. please let me know if in fact there were other similar reports. i am confident there are,as this super bright continuous glow attracted the attention of others staring off into the dark horizon east of miami beach fla. i am also calm because i know it's only a matter of time before the world becomes more familiar with our visitors. i only hope the "secret files" kept by our government will be shared and matched with the many eyewitness accounts, enhancing our knowledge in preparation for future visits. i know the fear is chaos in fear from the masses, but with educated knowledge and truth we should all be able to reach a better, calmed sense of understanding. i will never forget this event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright bluish white increasing glow hovering rise then drop changed to green appeared spinning slow take off north east drifting away horizontally

content.detailedDescription: I was filming the sun rise at top of the hill. my street bike had mechanical problems so i left my camera to film the sun rise. it was dark when i got there but on a near by hill i saw what i thought was a really big round turn signal. i did not give it much thought, as it became lighter i saw there was a huge plume of smoke going out wards and up. i watched it for a while (camera still recording it) i noticed two of what i thought to be a random couple watching the fire and the sun rise. one moving very quick back and forth like it was nervous one of them was much taller than the other. they where on a hill top to the right of me on the back side. i did not realize what was going on until i was about to leave. the sun was up and i could see very clearly what ever was in the middle of the smoke and fire took off shot of the hill at a 30 degree angle hooked a right at almost 80 degrees then traveled upwards path that just so happen to go right above me ( all on camera). it then started to dawn on me of what was going on. i looked down to where i saw the strange couple. i was wondering if the had seen it. that's when i knew i needed to get on my bike and get [item moved/cms/nd] outta there they had come around the trail and i saw what they where they had long what look like legs or more like long arms that bent out wards when they walked, they where wobbly when they took steps. they had short upper body as compared to the wobbly  legs or arms. i know what a human looks like from that distance they where much bigger. let me be clear about the legs because that all they had no arms. however the tracks they left on the ground where like huge hand prints very elongated palms 4 fingers one thumb on each leg almost two feet long. there is proof about the craft taking off there was a fire reported in the paper that put it self out before the fire department got there. on mt hamilton rd. that's like  packing a fire place full of wadded news paper and only half burning. i inspected the area and what i saw was very strange it looked like everything was flash burned bottles of beer (empty) where still in one piece, a pair of sunglasses where good except the lense was bubbled the aluminum frame was ok and there was what appeared to be a white residue on some of the area like an ash but different it was not from plant life. the area where the fire happen when i was riding back from mt hamilton at night cleared the fog from my visor and stung my neck a bit and still smelled like fire about a month after it happen. oh and its probably nothing but when i was walking around the side of the rd right before sun set i think they where coyotes above me but they had really long ears i saw the ears before i saw the heads. first i saw one then i saw about 8 more stick their heads up checking to see what i was doing. they where very strange looking coyotes if that's what they where. also when i felt the heat from the burnt out area there was a low resonance that seem to follow me and drown out the sound of my bike which is very loud. it seemed to follow me almost all the way off the hill. it felt like something hovering above me plus very strange gusts of hot wind pushing my bike around. i am not crazy, i don't make stuff up  i know others have seen what i am speaking of i talked to a few of the people that live in the areas around there and they can back up what i say, i have video proof and pictures. i know the area very active. i have also heard cow's screaming up there, seen lights  where there should be none been run off public land and roads by three different agency's. i do mean run off. please get back to me a.S.A.P.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Just before sunrise two beings watched it take off

content.detailedDescription: As same as above
content.summary: Observed object in single light form in a north. south flight path no structure or fuselage light flashed sporaticly in a non structured area appeared to slow down than turned in a southwesterly direction till it faded to the horizon

content.detailedDescription: Live in lakes of mount dora community, off state highway 44, mount dora, lake co. fl. just dropped wife off at [location removed/dr/cms], where she works. entered community through gate, and was proceeding south towards home on [location removed/dr/cms]. about 2 blocks from home, i observed at some distance an easily visible reflection off a silver metallic surface. at first i dismissed it as an airplane - i'd estimate it to be about 500 ft. in altitude and about 1/4 mile away, off to the south. when i was about one block from home i saw it again, only much more close and clearly this time. the object was nearly directly above me, only some distance from a 90 degree vertical from my location.  again the most distinct characteristic was the silver metallic reflection of sun light off the surface. the reflective surface looked rectangular. another portion of the object was dark in color and was either black or was not in a position for the sun light to reflect off it's surface.  i was sure now it was not an airplane, but it was similar in size to a small airplane but it made no noise.  stopped car and got out to observe object better. thought it might have been a large kite, that was quite high; perhaps it had gotten away from the flyer or perhaps the flyer was nearby.  i looked for a "dangling line" from the object but saw none.  i glanced around to a nearby open field but did not observe anyone in the field. looked back at the object - it was moving away from me in an easterly direction at an estimated 50 ft per second and appeared to be gaining altitude.  i got back into car, turned around in my driveway, and drove about 1/2 mile on road that was in the direction the object was moving (east).  parked car, got out and still could see the object in the sky off in the distance above the tree line. i got out my kindle notebook but by the time i got the guard off the notebook to take a photo the object was barely visible.  i managed to take four photos but by then the object was quite far away, however i could still make out the faint silver metallic reflection.  when i last saw the object it appeared much higher and was moving in an easterly direction.  in an attempt to catch up to it and obtain a closer photo i drove from the community and turned east onto state highway 44.  i drove east for about 2 miles, pulled off onto a side road, parked the car, got out and looked in the sky for about 5 minutes in all directions but could not see the object.  returned to my home. i was a bit anxious from the unknown i just witnessed, but knew i should report the sighting.
content.summary: Saw silver metallic reflection, mistook for airplane, observed about 5 min. as it gained altitude in easterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:30am on march 30th, 2015 i was outside and noticed a light in the sky. at first i thought it was a star, but then i noticed that it was changing color. i grabbed my camcorder out of the truck and started recording. as i zoomed in, it disappeared from my viewfinder twice. the third time i tried to record i was able to record a metallic gray spherical object in the sky. i recorded it for a little over 3 and a half minutes and during this time, it morphed it's shape, taking on the appearance of the moon at one point. it hovered in the sky above me for quite some time, then it moved slowly across the sky toward the west. it stayed in the sky until about 4:30am, until it began to move again. this time it disappeared into the early morning sky. i was in shock and awe. i am lucky that i had some charge left on my camcorder. although you can't see in the film, what i saw with the naked eye, i am sure someone might be able to brighten the video enough to identify it as the object i described. i didn't get any ill feelings toward the object and it didn't frighten me. it was more like a sensation of finding out something existed that i never thought i would find out. this was the main object that i paid attention to, however after reviewing my video, i saw that there were several other objects in the sky. i would gladly like someone to take the video and give me a logical explanation for what these objects are. since the night of march 30th, 2015, i have seen these strange lights in the northwest skies of houston, texas almost every night. i have since purchased a night-scope to try to capture more video, since i've heard that the nightscope technology might be alien technology, i figured i'd fight fire with fire. i am making an independent feature length film and have published this video on youtube as my trailer or preview of the film.
content.summary: I saw strange lights in the sky at 2:30am i reached for my camera and started recording

content.detailedDescription:
After parking my car and as i began walking to my home, i noticed 2 to 3 redish lights directly east from me, east from is is saddleback peak.  they were high enough that i could determine they were not coming from saddleback, but high above it.  i thought maybe they were flare's?  there were no planes in the night sky.  maybe some quad-copter hobbyists flying in formation?  looking east they appeard to drift from 2 o'clock towards 5 o'clock, i wondered why they would drift diagonally?  suddenly, there were 2 more, than 3 more, and more, and more and i said, 'wait! this is not normal' and reached for my cellphone thinking i could get a picture.  i thought even better, i will video capature it.  i'm not sure what would have been better, because when i realized i was actually witnessing an event, i got excited and could barely hold the phone/camera steady.  i did leave momentarily to find someone else to enjoy this 'light show' with, but ended up watching this event alone.  still high over saddleback peak at that 2 o'clock position they just turned off!

i searched all the ufo boards, search the internet, came up with nothing.  as the days passed, i heard nothing about this and forgot about it.  i came upon the video again and thought i should pass it on even though i did an embarassingly bad job of filming the event.
content.summary: From a few lights to many lights

content.detailedDescription: We were in bed on second story, our window was open and 2 flashing lights that looked like a large camera flash went off...Then 3 times randomly after that.
content.summary: We were in bed on second story, our window was open and 2 flashing lights that looked like a large camera flash went off...Then 3 times randomly after that.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on phone outside in the patio area,when i looked up i saw a metallic ufo looked like an inverted cross it passed fast and i got up and it went pasted my roof line so i could not see it any longer,it made no noise.It was very strange i have never seen any ufo's ever, i know what aircraft look like and blimps and helicopters this was not any of these.
content.summary: Metallic long inverted cross like shape made no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash in the rain when i turned back around and was meet with a blinding light in the sky that after seconds of observeing did a 90 degree turn and speed away
content.summary: Bright pale blue ball that turnd around and speed off

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio having coffee.I see this disc traveling in a straight path across the sky.This is the third time that i saw this object in two months.Did anyone else this object?
content.summary: This is the third time i saw this object from my backyard.I reported the first time that i saw it in april and the secoond time was a week ago but i did not report it.

content.detailedDescription:
From 2:30 - 4:30 am i observed multiple faint star-like objects in the southern sky at 80-85 degrees up. i was out looking to maybe see a satellite but after 10 mins i noticed that some "stars" were moving?! wtf! i then observed as many as 5 objects moving erratically in different directions, sometimes stopping on a dime and reversing directions. chasing each other at times. i also noticed lil bursts/ flashed of light around the objects. (not lighting) i still thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, but no. not after i saw one ufo skip across the sky from southern to northern sky (in 2 seconds), stop for a 5 minutes, then proceeding to skip across the sky to the east this time (lost sight due to trees). my cell phone video was not visible as you could imagine, but i did have the recorder on and i saved the 13 vid clips of me narrating what i saw as it happened. these looked to be out of the atmosphere as 2 planes flew over various times and the ufos/objects were clearly way... way above those commercial planes at 35k ft. i'm still baffled. 
fyi: i went out again last night about 3 am and again i saw similar objects in southern sky at 80 degrees for about 30 mins until the clouds came. i'm buying some high powered binoculars today to use. again from the naked eye these objects looked just like any ole star, until you realize they are zig zagging around.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like ufos in southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
What you can see is a photograph
i took myself on my i phone 4s, 
it was taken on the on the 7th of october 2011, 
it was a circular craft and stayed
 just long enough for me to notice it,
 then it accelerated, almost at light speed at a slight angle .
then it was gone and it didn't even leave a trail as you
would expect a comet, or meteorite too. so that rules that out,
 also in the image shape you can make out a distinctive circular shape.
the craft was also silent.
content.summary: The ufo was circular and was silent and stationary then as soon as it was there almost it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: On the night in question i left my house into my car out front started the car and pulled out ,saw straight away out my windscreen the lights in the sky almost like stars but brighter and in formation moving in the same rotation pattern ,5 of them in formation then a sudden change they started to leave the atmosphere one by one on the same tragectory ,leaving at a fast pace into space , then as i looked down from the sky i saw a object/craft hovering above the house silently rotating ,it was dark see through almost and cylindrical about the size of a large car and i could tell it was observing me ,then it started moving east across the roof tops silently quiet slow and as it went i lost sight of it behind the light of the street lamp.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights in sky and craft/object above me.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a mov8e w8t  my friend were we live and i went outaide to smoke a cigarette and i saw a red yelloish orange light above me about 400 ft and it wa shovering rast slowly . isisnt realise it at tirs then i said khadr my friend come check it out and he did  ni suspected a ufo and wen he cane the second one came out the dark sme 3xact lights exact oath until 5he 3rd one came out from the exact same spot above me . rhen the srcons one went faster  almost oast the firdt one and change direction to the left and the all slowly dimmed down until they diasapear.But it was badely visible for another 2 3 min. my friend took a video from the s4 but not too good quality i will have to aend it  after works if anyone reaches me i will email it its not in my phone.. i have never seen anything like it i usuakly am looking for and i hope you guys consideer this because we saw what we saw.Thank you
content.summary: I saw an object wit light above me pretty close anf hover east, few sec later 1 more n then last 1.2nd was faster n change direction .

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on a mattress on the living room floor with my baby in 2002 at my sisters home. it was 9:00 pm and it was very dark in he living room.  the object made me notice it. i was laying on my back when my head was forced to turn right and i could not move my body at all and i could not move my head. i saw a red light about 15-20 feet away about a foot off the ground. i heard a very high pitch sound it was so loud.  it did not seem to move at all but it wasn't there before.  at this same time it felt like my head was turning back and forth so rapidly it was not humanly possible to do that. i was not in control of my body. it all lasted i think maybe 30 seconds. i was too afraid to move once it ended. so i lay there for hours trying to figure out what had happened to me. the red light disappeared and the high pitch sound stopped at the same time i was able to move again. i definitely feel something else had control of me. the next day i looked around the living room and found no evidence of anything and there was no reasonable explanation of what i saw or heard and nothing that would have paralyzed me in that way making me feel like my brain was being scrambled or probed i guess.
content.summary: High pitch sound forced my head to turn and paralyzed me scrambled my head

content.detailedDescription: I just pulled out of my driveway and turned down shamrock drive heading east when i noticed twenty or more orange lights straight ahead in a giant flock. they were about 20 meters apart moving very slowly west towards uptown charlotte. i continued heading towards eastway drive and as i came closer to the stop light i tried pulling over but due to other cars and witnesses looking up as well i was unable to pull over and was forced to continue east on shamrock drive and eventually lost sight. i was almost stunned in shock and wondered if anyone felt the same way. i arrived to dinner and could not even eat.
content.summary: Twenty plus orange lights almost in a huge flock moving slowly towards downtown charlotte, nc.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was a bright white light in the sky and was about the size of a baseball, increasing in size at times to bigger than a basketball. we stopped on a over pass off of hwy 29 to watch the object and observed it for about 20 min. the object moved like nothing i have seen before, it would be in one part of the sky one second and in another part the next it was the most unnatural thing i have ever seen. we left and got back on the road it was about 1:30 am. at about 2:30 i remember i looked in my rear view mirror and saw the object again, like it was following us, i remember we were all afraid, the next thing i remember the sun was coming up and we were driving on the wrong road and we were almost to madison...We were trying to get to green bay.
content.summary: We saw the object in the sky driving down the highway, we stopped on an over pass & watched the object dart around for 20 min, we left, and saw the object again behind us, like it was chasing us. next thing i remember we were on the road in madison

content.detailedDescription:
Looked up at 90 degree to see a large white light at very high altitude traviling at great speed going due east from my overheard sighting. lasting less than 10 seconds it traveled the entire sky to slowly fade in lumns and loosing visibility at about 20 degree angle. altitude seemed to be in the the range of satilites as planes were in sky att. clear sky, star visibility good

possible near earth astroid?
content.summary: Very bright from west, fading to east, no trail but speed of a meteor, large

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house and bethany went outside to smoke a cigarette and see if i could see a tornado but a break in the clouds happened and i saw a perfect trinity symbol with three triangles   at first i thought it was just a rare happening of perfect triangles in the sky directly in a pattern of three in the giant triangle i've always been amazed by the universe and was really excited i just started snapping pictures whenever i came back inside since it was storming very badly with the tornado sirens going off everywhere in town i started reviewing the pictures i had taken and as a zoomed in i realized there were hundreds of these triangles all over the sky point in all different directions some with three black dots others with three white dots they couldn't have been stars because the clouds were huge with the tornado right down the street i started trying to send some of the pictures i had taken the my phone malfunction for about 20 minutes like it never has before they can't morphing into different things like the triangle it looks like a boomerang and all different sizes there was a giant cigar with the dots in the center of it in the sky but it could've been cloud but it was a perfect saucer they made no sound at all but behind them was a perfect circular cloud in the sky like that's what they came out of i had to quit taking pictures because my phone began to mal function but i was able to get off at least 25 photos all different shapes from small to large and when you zoom in you can really see how many triangles there really were hundreds of them i appreciate mufon so much this is my second sighting keep up the good work and positive vibes to all of mufon
content.summary: Tornado sirens going off here tonite and i was outside smoking and saw a morphing triangle with 4 bright orbs triangles everywhere on every picture i took trinity sign and when i went back yo zoom in their was hundred or more 3dot triangles

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: There were 6 blinking lights across the north sky one would blink after another
content.summary: 6 blinking lights across the sky blinking one after another

content.detailedDescription: I was with my family getting ready to go on a fishing trip the following morning (opening day for walleye in ny).  it was around 10 pm.  a large intense bright light started to streak across the sky from left to right as i faced north with a trail of white light behind it.  i knew it wasn't a shooting star, it was to large and the light was to intense.  the intense light continued across the horizon unti it broke into 3 distinct, tailed objects.  as the object continued, after breakup, the 3 objects turned from white to blue to red and then trickled out of sight, like a sparkler firework burning out.
content.summary: The object we saw was in our atmosphere, and had a dramatic breakup.

content.detailedDescription: i have written you folks before, but i got sick and didn't make the meeting. would like to meet someone about several events since that time period, when i saw two trapizoid looking craft 30ft length 15ft wide, bright chrome circled aircraft as if sending or receiving signals. and course left with speed we just dream about. i have seen several others one i called the faa about a large craft that seemed to be crashing but it had other plans.
content.summary: Hovered in location for 15 seconds and lett at beyound light speed

content.detailedDescription:
The most recent event of several this past year occurred last month (april 2015), and again it occurred around 3 am. the event began with me asleep in my bedroom, and we were awoken by the sound of three distinct bell-like tones. there were no cell phones in the room, and nothing we own made a sound like that. it was loud enough to wake us from a sound sleep. when we woke up, right after the bell sounds, a brilliant white light shone in the 4 small windows high up on the wall in our 3rd floor bedroom, and at the same time a massive white light shone through the 4 patio doors that make up the bedroom wall- they open out on a deck and the deck looks out on a canal behind our house. the light seemed to be as large as the house was wide- i estimate 60 feet. as i ran to the doors to look, the light seemed to move over the roof of the house, and as it did, a deep black shadow followed in its wake. as i watched, i saw what appeared to be a police car moving up the street- what was odd is that, this being a summer community, the homes are mostly empty until the season starts in june. you never see a police car just cruising- only when summer parties get out of hand and someone calls them. this police car was silent, and the lights on top were unlike any i have seen. police cars always have a light bar on top, with red and blue lights on the ends and white in the middle. this car had a circular flat disc of white lights on top, that rotated in a circular motion, and i thought how unusual it was- i have never seen flat circular white lights on top of a police car. the other unusual thing was that the "street" the police car was driving along....Was water. the canal. 
this is the most recent in a series of various sightings over the past year, beginning with the sighting of a large. black wedge=shaped craft with 5 huge round white lights-moving silently and slowly over the ocean's edge about 20 feet over the waves. i made a report on that not long ago. i really wanted to get out of the car and flag it down, but i was unable to walk easily over the dunes. i seemed to be uncharacteristically uninterested in getting out of the car, however, and after we got home i was very disappointed that i just simply...Left- without staying to watch what it did- whether it went under the water etc. since then, there have been several events where brilliant white lights shine in our bedroom windows, usually between 3 and 5 am. these range from just the brilliant light to orbs which "thin out" into bluish discs before simple disappearing. they do not ascend. they do not "leave" - they simply disappear. 
the event at the beginning of the report is the most recent, having occurred just 2 weeks ago and the only one where the craft/light seemed to actually move over the house and leave.
content.summary: Massive bright white light in windows, doors, followed by movement over the roof.

content.detailedDescription: Small frisby like object was observe moving at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Small black frisby like odject observed going sw. at a high rate of speed. two woman observe this while we were in car.

content.detailedDescription:
2004 at 10:30 pm, the red socks had just won the world series and went out side to see eclipse of the moon and saw three golden triangles going north on the hudson river. they were moving in sync and maybe could be one object with three lights or three objects in sync. they were moving very slow and witness could not see any boats on the water at that time.
we were 300 feet from the river and 500 feet in the air. it made no sound.
content.summary: Red socks had just won the world series and went out side to see eclispe of the moon saw three golden triangles going north on the hudson river
